rules_text:
Players may play cards from among cards they own in exile and in graveyards.
If a player would own no cards in their graveyard, in exile and in their library, they win the game.
{3}: Each player exiles the top two cards of their library. Any player may activate this ability.
_
rules_text2:
Flying
When Jalieragam enters, each player shuffles all cards they own in exile and in their graveyards into their libraries.
If Jalieragam would leave the battlefield, shuffle it into its owners library instead..
